Homepage.Slider_text1: We are the official representatives of Maxtrek and Bearway in Georgia
Homepage.part1_text2: We care about your safety and comfort
Homepage.part2_text: We are constantly monitoring the quality of our products
Homepage.part4_text1: New tires at the best price

AboutusPage.About3: We are the official representatives of Maxtrek and Bearway in Georgia and sell their new products, as well as second-hand tires from other brands throughout Georgia. We have 12 years of successful experience in this field, we are developing every day and opening new branches. We are direct importers of products, so we constantly strive to maintain an ideal balance of quality and price in both retail and wholesale.
AboutusPage.About4: We understand that our success depends on customer satisfaction
AboutusPage.About6: Constant care for quality and your safety
AboutusPage.About7: Satisfied customer is our guarantee of stable work
